Headline: REVISED: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: REVISED: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
REVISED: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division. 

Northbound buses are not affected. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Damen
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Damen, Archer, and 35th  due to, construction at 35th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 35th, Damen, Archer, and 35th  due to, construction at 35th/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.
